messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/24/02 12:32:22 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:   Ok,
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/24/02 12:32:22 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< Me too! Where do we send our dollars? <bwg> >>

Ok, OK...I guess that there is more interest than I thought. :)
So, if anyone wants a copy of the list I made (it's a list of ways to use
newspaper, balloons, boxes and other common household items for fun and
games) just send $1.00 to:
Ren Allen
5210 Springhill Drive
Pensacola, FL
32503

Once again, more stuff will be available at our website soon!!!
